strings.obj.n_a2ac0e34.text: Software engineering oriented to stability, automation, and critical systems.
strings.obj.floating.action.phone.attrs.title: Call
strings.obj.floating.action.email.attrs.title: Send email
strings.obj.n_e5a277a0.text: Focused on stability, automation, and existing systems. From critical infrastructure to software engineering.
strings.obj.n_0c7c7840.text: Two decades of evolution. From critical infrastructure to
strings.obj.n_57404cb5.text: "The peak of responsibility. Eight years at the financial core where tolerance for error was zero."
strings.obj.n_0c751258.text: Ensured uninterrupted operation of core banking systems in a 24/7 environment. Built PowerShell automation to standardize operations across thousands of servers.
strings.obj.n_3fad47eb.text: 24/7 banking environment. Zero tolerance for failures.
strings.obj.n_9d7faed4.text: Operational discipline: automation, observability, and change control in 24/7 environments.
strings.obj.n_04a0cb80.text: I bring that operational discipline into software: predictable delivery, safe changes, and long-term reliability.
strings.obj.n_a0c1438e.text: "Industrial robustness. Every stopped system had an immediate, tangible physical cost."
strings.obj.n_fe74ad68.text: IT support in a demanding industrial environment where downtime had immediate physical impact. Networks, terminals, and logistics operations.
strings.obj.n_768b4379.text: Refinery and heavy logistics environment. Physical pressure for rapid resolution under adverse conditions.
strings.obj.n_65c54164.text: Robustness first: design for failure and recovery, not best-case paths.
strings.obj.n_68453bfb.text: That resilience mindset translates into software that degrades gracefully and stays maintainable.
strings.obj.n_7e2190f4.text: "The era of scale. Where I learned that large infrastructures are built in layers of abstraction."
strings.obj.n_9e3cfaec.text: Supported early cloud and virtualization at scaleâ€”bridging physical infrastructure and logical layers.
strings.obj.n_604e3738.text: Managing complexity at scale. Understanding how virtual instances interact without physical conflicts.
strings.obj.n_3893d0ab.text: Systemic thinking: understand the full architecture before acting on isolated components.
strings.obj.n_4ce41264.text: I apply this systemic view to build modular, scalable software.
strings.obj.n_d723cd48.text: "The human foundation. Between the early technical work and multicultural management in Oslo, I learned the value of communication."
strings.obj.n_7b4df670.text: Started in 1999 as an IT technician. This was followed by a deliberate and enriching break in the Tourism and Customer Success sector in Oslo.
strings.obj.n_139d5b30.text: High-turnover multicultural environments. Managing expectations and rapid problem diagnosis under social pressure.
strings.obj.n_cab680d4.text: Empathy as diagnosis. Understanding the user's pain is half of the technical solution.
strings.obj.n_88e372cf.text: I translate complex business needs into code that solves real problems.
strings.obj.n_ad7792a8.text: Focus on Python and the art of
strings.obj.n_5bc407c4.text: For me, code is a tool for stability. Skill levels are living indicatorsâ€”reviewed continuously from real practice, formal training, and active projects.
strings.obj.n_f8dcfbd4.text: Programming I & II â€“ University of Helsinki
strings.obj.n_18768be0.text: Structured and demanding training. Mastery of algorithms, data structures, and OOP with Python.
strings.obj.n_abfb969c.text: I moved from technical support to programmatic computing. Where others see a script, I see a resilient automation system.
strings.obj.n_42a8ed53.text: Able to work autonomously in backend and automation, with attention to robustness and maintenance.
strings.obj.n_5e754bc8.text: Formal consolidation of foundations already used in real operations. EQF level 4. Includes a 210h internship (FCT).
strings.obj.n_bf98168b.text: Reinforces architectural fundamentals and disciplined delivery for robust, scalable applications.
strings.obj.n_4344d31c.text: Fullstack contribution with focus on quality and maintainability.
strings.obj.n_177113cc.text: Level 5 cybersecurity specialization course aligned with the official skills framework, with a strong practical component and internship (485h). The CET internship starts around April 2017 (approx.).
strings.obj.n_f2e114e0.text: Reinforces technical continuity: security and compliance over a proven base in critical systems. Indicators evolve throughout the CET as modules and projects progress.
strings.obj.n_d02e0b6c.text: Reinforcement in cybersecurity and compliance on a proven base in critical systems.
strings.obj.n_41bf5924.text: Risk and impact analysis in systems
strings.obj.n_42bf5ab8.text: Application of security principles in operational environments
strings.obj.n_43bf5c48.text: Understanding of compliance requirements and best practices
strings.obj.n_44bf5ddc.text: Protection of systems and information in critical contexts
strings.obj.n_3dbf52d8.text: Integration of security into the operational and development cycle
strings.obj.n_754c61a0.text: My reasoning is deterministic. I believe in the process, the right timing for each step, and the absolute isolation of variables to solve any problem.
strings.obj.n_46a86bd8.text: "My structured family life and these real hobbies shape how I work: discipline in the process, attention to detail, and consistency."
strings.obj.n_4d894d60.text: I am married and have a 13-year-old son. Adoption was a long, structured, demanding, and regulated process that requires patience, predictability, emotional stability, and consistent routines.
strings.obj.n_f4b2efaf.text: This path reinforced critical skills for long projects: consistency, predictability, and commitment to processes.
strings.obj.n_e32d0720.text: Making bread is a regular hobby of mine. In artisan bread, skipping steps destroys the result. Fermentation time is a dependency that can't be rushed without compromising structure.
strings.obj.n_b9d796a8.text: In software, robust architectures require the right time for design and validation. Respecting dependencies and code maturation time avoids catastrophic technical debt.
strings.obj.n_1da7ebe8.text: Making pizza at home is a hobby of mine. A perfect pizza is the result of small adjustments each batch. Temperature, hydration, timeâ€”every detail is tuned based on the previous result.
strings.obj.n_9d3f6ed8.text: Programming is iteration. I prefer small, frequent deliveries that allow quick course correction, ensuring the final product aligns with reality.
strings.obj.n_ea6a42af.text: Gel nail maintenance is a manual hobby of mine. It taught me that preventing is cheaper than repairing. Small, frequent care avoids bigger failures and preserves integrity.
strings.obj.n_1814b584.text: In software, prevention is constant refactoring, regular testing, and daily attention to detail. The same logic avoids silent failures and keeps systems reliable over the years.
strings.obj.n_98b8531c.text: The initial contact with digital marketing wasn't planned. It arose during gel nail training: most nail technicians work alone, so the course included marketing notions. Continued exposure to the topic led me to self-study.
strings.obj.n_ef28c5cc.text: For me, marketing is not a parallel careerâ€”it's product awareness. It translates into three pillars: thinking about the end user, communicating clearly, and delivering value before technology.
strings.obj.n_ed730b68.text: I follow laws and electoral systems as a personal and structural interest, not political. Itâ€™s a fascination with explicit rules, procedural precision, and system integrity.
strings.obj.n_1399b6a0.text: I see this as a structured cognitive exercise, similar to a systems audit: sound data, auditable transitions, and clear rules at each step.
strings.obj.n_42d01578.text: This shows that I value the right timing, prevention, and continuous careâ€”and I apply that logic every day in software.
strings.obj.n_f60b024c.text: Who I am shows in how I
strings.obj.n_a7269434.text: I've worked with technology since the late 90s, with a strong base in critical systems, automation, and 24/7 infrastructure. I re-entered software development focused on continuity, predictability, and technical quality.
strings.obj.n_a82695c8.text: I am married and have a 13-year-old son; that family stability translates into focus, predictability, and technical reliability at work. I bring to code the discipline of environments where failure wasn't an option.
strings.obj.n_a9269758.text: Beyond the technical side, I have training in value communication, metrics, and product awarenessâ€”useful to align decisions, language, and impact with the end user.

strings.obj.n_85466c7b.text: 24/7 banking infrastructure with zero tolerance for failures
strings.obj.n_acd94320.text: BNP Paribas, CEPSA, TelefÃ³nica â€” environments where stability was absolute.
strings.obj.n_e40d6abc.text: University of Helsinki (270h) + EFA IT Programmer (1,416h). C/C++, C#, Java, Python, SQL.
strings.obj.n_0908d250.text: Absolute rigor and stability as a continuous process
strings.obj.n_241fb9f8.text: The mindset built in critical environments now applies to software development.
strings.obj.n_a8584a78.text: Ability to work in international teams and communicate with global stakeholders.
strings.obj.n_71b19538.text: Married, father of a 13-year-old â€” focus and predictability
strings.obj.n_7d1d07b0.text: That family stability translates into technical reliability and long-term commitment.
strings.obj.n_b2eaded4.text: Value communication, metrics, and product awareness
strings.obj.n_353d9d4c.text: Complementary training that helps think about the end user and communicate clearly.
strings.obj.n_42736560.text: Access my professional documents and certifications.
strings.obj.n_9d485980.text: What I'm looking for at this
strings.obj.n_82ec4bb0.text: Available for a curricular internship (210h) in a real development or systems context, able to contribute effectively from day one.
strings.obj.n_638fe72c.text: The theoretical component ends in late June, and the internship can start from June 2026.
strings.obj.n_e1237988.text: Preference for remote (nationwide) and a hybrid alternative in the BraganÃ§a area.
strings.obj.n_bcdc387c.text: The internship is supervised by the training provider, with an individual plan and defined objectives.
strings.obj.n_b1064db4.text: Does not require basic training â€” I'm already used to real work contexts and systems with history.
strings.obj.n_c557d630.text: Contact helps align expectations and context.
strings.obj.n_a379f362.text: Available for projects where technical maturity and human commitment make the difference.
